summary: 检测用友NC系统接口UserAuthenticationServlet是否存在反序列化RCE漏洞(XVE-2024-18302)，该漏洞允许未经身份验证的攻击者在服务器端执行任意代码，写入后门并获取服务器权限。
summary_en: Detect whether the UserAuthenticationServlet interface of Yonyou NC system has a deserialization RCE vulnerability (XVE-2024-18302). This vulnerability allows unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary code on the server side, write backdoors, and gain server permissions.
